Comments_List: The overview and knowledge about distributed systems; the skills to develop a distributed system
I have learned a lot of important concepts in distributed system. Also, I have developed the skill to build a real peer-to-peer network and the ability to solve a real problem.
A chronological introduction and a big picture of distributed systems.
C++, Cloud Computing, Cryptographic Knowledge in Distributed Knowledge.
Knowledge about distributed system like privacy, accountability, reputation system and block chain.
A deep understanding about the design and implementation of distributed systems. Also know the history of distributed systems and different type of distributed systems.
distributed system
Better understanding of the distributed systems in terms of the components, protocols, etc.

strengths: The professor is very nice and the examples given in the course is very easy to understand.
weaknesses: None.
The strength is the course is easy to understand and the topics are interested and closely related to real production.

Strength: Comprehensive introduction/ Practical experience
Weakness: theoretical aspect of distributed systems
Very good.
I think there should be more interesting projects and labs.
The strength is that you can learn a lot and each time we enjoyed this class.
This course covered a good amount of variety related to the topic.

Effective organization and assignments. The group presentation format could be improved. I felt like there was no incentive to learn the material from any other group considering the format of the final. It would have been more instructive to have the readings required for all members of the class and perhaps more of a discussion format.

Yes. Because by the help of this course they can have a clear understanding of the basic knowledge about distributed system, and they can also have the chance to develop their own distributed system, which can not only strengthen what they have learned in the class but also enrich their resume.
Yes. Because you can learn a lot from the course and the instructor is really nice.
Yes. This course covers a lot of interesting and cutting-edge topics in DS.
Yes, good course and I have learnt a lot.
I would recommend this course to another student because it is very interesting.

strongly recommend
I would. It's a very interesting topic, and the professor was really helpful.

Yes. This was a good overview of distributed systems and the programming of such systems. Since many large scale systems are distributed in nature nowadays, this is a very important area to a few large tech companies.
